resources.string: Do you love listening to audiobooks, but hate finding your place again after falling asleep or leaving your phone?
Nightreader is the player that also listens to you. If you fall asleep, you stop moving. If you stop moving, the player stops playing.

Don\'t worry, it\'s sensitive. Although, if you want to disable the sensor for any reason, use the sensor button to the far right.\n\nSend comments, feature requests, and bug reports to jesse.frush@gmail.com
